item.title: Angular 17 & .NET 8 - Google OAuth2 Sign-on
item.description: 流程 導向至 Google 登入頁面。 接收來自 Google 的回應。 以 code 取得 Token。 以 access_token 取得使用者資訊。 以使用者資訊註冊或登入 一、設定 Google OAuth 2.0 登入 Google API Console。

item.title: 怎麼串接綠界金流？以 Angular & .NET 實作

item.title: .NET 6 - Build Line Notify Web API
item.description: 此篇文章將會透過 .NET 6 來實作Line Notify，傳送文字、貼圖與相片至Line。 詳細的Line API規格請至Line官方文件查詢。 Implementation 1. Line No

item.title: .NET 6 - Authentication and Authorization with JWT
item.description: In this article, we will use .NET 6 to authenticate and authorize user with JWT in role based. Design Authenticate user and generate JWT. Pass JWT in each request. Validate JWT. Authorize Implementaion 1. Models User public class User { public int UserId { get; set; } public string UserName { get; set; } public string Password { get; set; } public UserRole Role { get; set; } public string?

item.title: .NET 6 - Operate database by EFCore
item.description: The Entity Framework (ADO.NET Entity Framework) is a set of technologies in ADO.NET. In the following article, I will introduce two methods, Database first and Code first, to Connect SQL Server DB in ASP.NET6 Web API by Entity Framework Core. Either one can achieve our goal. Let’s start! DB First Add Model Package required Open Package Manager Console Use Scaffold-DbContext to generate code for a DbContext and entity types from database.
